summary: The film director Niko von Glasow undertakes a journey to athletes, who compete at the Paralympic Games in London 2012. He himself is a short-armed avowed hater of sport who cannot ... See full summary Â»
cast: Niko von Glasow|Greg Polychronidis|Matt Stutzman|Christiane Reppe|Aida Husic Dahlen|Prince Harry|Queen Elizabeth II|Phillip Semechin|Mandel von Glasow
title: Mein Weg nach Olympia
